about_the_game:
🏆 Winner of the Grand Jury Prize for Best VR Work at the 78th Venice International
Film Festival (2021)
🎞 Nominated for an Emmy Award in the Outstanding Interactive Media Innovation
category (2022)

ABOUT GOLIATH

Through mind-bending animation, GOLIATH: PLAYING WITH REALITY explores the
limits of reality and a true story of so-called ‘schizophrenia’ and the power of gaming
communities.

Echo (Tilda Swinton) guides you through the many realities of Goliath, a man who spent
years isolated in psychiatric institutions but finds connection in multiplayer games.
Combining heartfelt dialogue, mesmerising visuals and symbolic interactions, weave
through multiple worlds to uncover Goliath’s poignant story.







Follow Goliath himself on his Twitch channel
Follow our Instagam for updates #goliathvr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Inter Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

reviews:
“For anybody inclined to question the powerfully boundary-less capacities of VR to inspire and encourage empathy, inclusion, fellowship and transformation, GOLIATH might well be the original game changer. Beautiful, profoundly engaging and eventually resonantly simple, this work pushes the parameters of our understanding of the potential for the impact of gaming to provide a life-saving web of connection, support and joy for those who may be otherwise isolated and challenged by society. We emerge from its immersion into a reality with a kinder light and a brighter horizon.”
Tilda Swinton

“By turns gripping, sad, and poignant, it’s one of the great moving image attempts to understand mental illness from the inside out.”
IndieWire

“At a time when virtual reality fuels the fantasy of a metaverse that allows us to free ourselves from certain limitations of the physical world, Goliath uses this technology for the opposite purpose: to make us experience the struggle and suffering of many men and women in the grip of great psychological difficulties, very real and too often forgotten. (Translated from French)”
Le Monde
short_description: Narrated by Tilda Swinton, winner of Best VR Work at the 78th Venice International Film Festival and Emmy®-nominated GOLIATH: PLAYING WITH REALITY is a 25-minute animated VR experience about a man who spent years isolated in psychiatric institutions but finds connection in multiplayer games.
